DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study open , control , prospective , single center , single-surgeon , post-market-clinical-follow-up study evaluate long-term ( 18 month ) effectiveness femtolaser-assisted astigmatic keratotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Evaluation Long-term Effectiveness Femtosecond Laser-assisted Arcuate Incisions
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose prospective post-market-clinical-follow-up study address long-term effectiveness arcuate incision , eye VICTUS femtosecond laser-assisted astigmatic keratotomy . This study conduct Gemini eye clinic Zlin , Czech Republic Dr. Pavel Stodulka examine 100 eye previously receive VICTUS femtolaser-assisted arcuate incision treatment . Patients recruit accord study inclusion/exclusion criterion .
